review: Works just as advertised.  Easy to use. It gives instant access to Netflix and Amazon.
author: Eric Stanford

review: I love being able to watch Prime TV and movies on our large HD TV!  Excellent product!
author: Reader Ann

review: Would not connect to my wifi network. Confirmed my network password wasn't the issue.
author: Marcus Reeder

review: Works great with all the apps I use and is very easy to navigate. Overall very satisfied with the fire stick.
author: Lauren Semple

review: Amazingly easy to install and works as promised. Great product.
author: Susan M. Boak "Thurstoncat"

review: Wow what a deal Amazon has here. I paid under 20 for it and have been very happy so far.
author: gt3347

review: Undecided, my router is in the kitchen downstairs, and this will not connect in my bedroom upstairs, does not find the router, the ROKU I have hooked up to my TV will connect no problem.
author: C. Doyon "bikergirl"

review: Outstanding what this thing can do, well worth the money.
author: William A  Yankoski
